Name: Desktop NEKO Girl
About the game: ★This is a desktop nurturing kitten pet that can be placed anywhere on your computer desktop. ★You can customize your pet's name and give her a nice name. ★She needs you to take good care of her food life. According to your training, she will become better and better or she may die. ★Take good care of your pet, she also has emotions. You also need to eat and bathe. ★Have 20 + hairstyles and clothes in the game, try to make your pet change into a new one. ★Make your pet better through study and work. ★There are many different types of work. Choose your favorite occupation and go on!
